title: Ep 6: Grandmotherly Advice
description:
Today's Proceedings: Wise words from a grandmother, a sister who cams, and a young Reddit user giving advice.  We also give some of our own hot takes for you to judge us on and pitch our OnlyFans!

Follow us on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/judgiespod

Follow us on Instagram:
https://instagram.com/judgiespod

Music by:
James Young
